artist: Artist: Antoni Tàpies; Author: Jacques Dupin; Printer: Joan Barbarà, Barcelona, Spain; Publisher: Co-published by Galeria Toni Tàpies, Barcelona, Spain; Publisher: Co-published by Daniel Lelong, Paris
description: solid wood box with character at top and bottom in black ink; portfolio inside with large abstract ink drawing on cover with eye and cross shape; contains twenty free-floating images; lender's archive #184
image_copyright: © Antoni Tapies and Jacques Dupin %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
markings: Numbered in pencil on the colophon page: 56; numbered in pencil, LLC of the frontispiece image (opposite title page): 56/150
medium: Color etchings with carborundum, aquatint, and embossing; letterpress
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed: Signed by the author and artist in pencil on the colophon page: J. Dupin | Tapies. Also signed by the artist in pencil, LRC of the frontispiece image (opposite title page): Tapies
title: Matière du souffle
